plot outline: This is a coming of age story of Rohan Bhatia and Neha Kapoor, two young, hip, effervescent individuals whose lives change forever once they meet and fall in love. Rohan is a brash, cocky, ambitious, 24 year old MBA graduate who wants instant success and he'll do anything to make that come true! Rohan moves to Mumbai to pursue a career as a stockbroker where he meets Neha, a no nonsense, strong headed girl who's come to Mumbai to follow her dreams, the dream of becoming a film actor. Neha is someone who believes in love, but hasn't given and guy a chance because no one measures up to her standards of Mr. Right. That's until Rohan comes along and her life changes completely. Both of them have different wants, desires and quests but they manage to come together and go on a journey that intertwines their personal and professional lives where they touch the peaks of love, loss, despair, longing, betrayal and redemption.
title: Jo Hum Chahein
plot: In his bid to quickly boost his career, a male alienates himself from his family, friends, and true love.

Delhi-based Rohan Bhatia, the only son of widower Brigadier Dalip, successfully obtains his MBA degree, decides to party with others, including girlfriend No.31, much to his father's displeasure who wanted to spend some time with him. He then re-locates to Mumbai and gets hired by 'Bombay Bulls' as a stockbroker where he, and dozens of others, are given a period of three months to reach the top 10. He befriends a long-time employee, Vikram Khurana, and is introduced to wealthy widow, Amrita Singhania. Rohan also meets with an aspiring model/actress, Neha Kapoor, and successfully woos and beds her. His father and Neha want to spend quality time with him on the occasion of his 25th birthday but he travels to Goa to meet with Amrita to become her Fund Manager. This meeting becomes intimate and he ends up spending the night with her. Shocks and disappointments are in store for him when he returns to Mumbai when he finds Vikram has decided to invite his father for lunch; a physical altercation results with his co-worker, Akash, and he ends up being reprimanded; but nothing will prepare him for the shock when a displeased Neha will inform him that she is not only pregnant - but not interested in seeing him anymore.::rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)
